title: Tuition Fees
question: How much is the tuition fee at SorSU?
answer: SorSU is a state university and offers free tuition for qualified students under the Universal Access to Quality Tertiary Education Act.

title: Scholarships
question: Are there scholarships available?
answer: Yes. SorSU offers academic, athletic, and government-funded scholarships such as CHED and DOST.

title: Payment Methods
question: How can I pay my school fees?
answer: Payments may be made at the university cashier or through accredited bank partners. Always request an official receipt.

title: Outstanding Balance
question: How can I check my outstanding balance?
answer: You can check your account status at the Cashierâ€™s Office or through the student portal if enabled.

title: Refund Policy
question: Can I request a refund if I withdraw from the semester?
answer: Refunds are allowed only within the first two weeks of classes and subject to administrative approval.

title: Allowance
question: Does SorSU provide student allowances?
answer: Only qualified scholars and grantees under government programs may receive allowances.
